review: This thing rocks! I got it for PLEX and its great.

review: Love watching movies on the tv. Easy set-up. Love it!

review: Great small box  to entertain.  Has a lot of great movies, apps and games  for everyone.

review: good, I haven't been able to use it much, But like it when I can turn it on.

review: I am so happy to get to watch movies now. Thank you for coming up with such good tech items.

review: Easy to set up and an amazing picture quality.  The voice recognition was perfect, even when I had a bad cold. Added the game controller to the package and my kid doesn't want to stop playing with it.

review: Great streaming box.XBMC also works great on the fire TV box

review: Does exactly what expected. Love the voice search. Works great, easy to hook up, and is fast.

review: Very slick, fast, lots of free stuff.  Still getting hang of rewind/forward, but other than that it seems to be completely intuitive.
